metadata.title: CVE-2018-11781 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Apache SpamAssassin 3.4.2 fixes a local user code injection in the metarule syntax.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sa-compile - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
spamassassin - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
spamc - 3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spamassassin package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
